donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: UNDP is providing quality assurance and oversight of project activities including the financial management. A proper internal control framework has been applied in order to ensure that the activities are implemented in line with quality and fiduciary standards. The Annual Work Plan and the Procurement Plan serve as the basis of monitoring activities

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: Enhanced coordination, monitoring and evaluation on the implementation of the Aceh Nias Reconstruction Continuation Action Plan  2010-2012 (Renaksi Kesinambungan Rekonstruksi Aceh Nias 2010-2012)

project_descr: TECHNICAL SUPPORT FOR BADAN REHABILITASI DAN REKONSTRUKSI (BRR) NAD - NIAS
